trans-unit.source: Implements a server channel for remote calls that uses the TCP protocol to transmit messages.
trans-unit.target: 實作伺服器通道為使用 TCP 通訊協定以傳輸訊息的遠端呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Channels transport messages across remoting boundaries (for example, computers or application domains).
trans-unit.target: 通道會傳輸訊息跨越遠端界限 （例如，電腦或應用程式定義域）。

trans-unit.source: The TcpServerChannel class transports messages using the TCP protocol.
trans-unit.target: TcpServerChannel 類別傳輸使用的 TCP 通訊協定的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Channels are used by the .NET Framework remoting infrastructure to transport remote calls.
trans-unit.target: 通道會使用.NET Framework 遠端處理基礎結構來傳輸遠端呼叫。

trans-unit.source: When a client makes a call to a remote object, the call is serialized into a message that is sent by a client channel and received by a server channel.
trans-unit.target: 當用戶端的遠端物件的呼叫時，呼叫會序列化成訊息是由用戶端通道所傳送和接收的伺服器通道。

trans-unit.source: It is then deserialized and processed.
trans-unit.target: 然後還原序列化，並處理。

trans-unit.source: Any returned values are transmitted by the server channel and received by the client channel.
trans-unit.target: 任何傳回的值是由伺服器通道傳送，並由用戶端通道接收。

trans-unit.source: To perform additional processing of messages on the server side, you can specify an implementation of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkProvider> interface through which all messages processed by the TcpServerChannel instance are passed.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行額外處理的訊息在伺服器端，您可以指定的實作<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkProvider>介面透過 TcpServerChannel 執行個體所處理的所有訊息會都傳遞。</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkProvider>

trans-unit.source: The TcpServerChannel instance accepts messages serialized in either binary or SOAP format.
trans-unit.target: TcpServerChannel 執行個體會接受二進位或 SOAP 格式中序列化的訊息。

trans-unit.source: A TcpServerChannel object has associated configuration properties that can be set at run time either in a configuration file (by invoking the static <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingConfiguration.Configure%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method) or programmatically (by passing a <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> collection to the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel.%23ctor%2A> constructor).
trans-unit.target: TcpServerChannel 物件具有相關聯的組態屬性可以設定在執行階段組態檔中 (藉由叫用靜態<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingConfiguration.Configure%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法) 或以程式設計方式 (藉由傳遞<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>集合<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel.%23ctor%2A>建構函式)。</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingConfiguration.Configure%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For a list of these configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe).
trans-unit.target: 如需這些組態屬性的清單，請參閱[通道和格式器組態屬性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the server computer is running Windows 95/98/Me, the TcpServerChannel cannot be specified as secure.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果伺服器電腦正在執行 Windows 95/98/Me，TcpServerChannel 不能指定為安全。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel"></xref> class that listens on the specified port.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel"></xref>指定通訊埠接聽的類別。

trans-unit.source: To request that an available port be dynamically assigned, set the `port` parameter to 0 (zero).
trans-unit.target: 若要要求可用的通訊埠動態指派，請設定`port`參數為 0 （零）。

trans-unit.source: The port on which the channel listens.
trans-unit.target: 通道所接聽的通訊埠。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel"></xref> class with the specified channel properties and sink.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel"></xref>具有指定的通道屬性和接收器的類別。

trans-unit.source: For more information about channel configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe).
trans-unit.target: 如需通道組態屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[通道和格式器組態屬性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the server computer is running Windows 95/98/Me, the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel> cannot be specified as secure.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果伺服器電腦正在執行 Windows 95/98/Me，<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel>不能指定為安全。</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel>

trans-unit.source: If you do not require sink functionality, set the `sinkProvider` parameter to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不需要接收功能，設定`sinkProvider`參數`null`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> collection specifying values for configuration properties to be used by the channel.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>指定通道所使用的組態屬性的值的集合。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkProvider"></xref> implementation to be used by the channel.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkProvider"> </xref>通道所使用的實作。

trans-unit.source: A provided channel property was badly formatted.
trans-unit.target: 提供的通道屬性格式不正確。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel"></xref> class with the given name and that listens on the specified port.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel"></xref>類別具有指定名稱，且會在指定的連接埠上接聽。

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel.ChannelName%2A> property by using the `name` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式設定<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel.ChannelName%2A>屬性使用`name`參數。</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel.ChannelName%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want to register more than one channel, each channel must have a unique name.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要註冊一個以上的通道，每個通道都必須具有唯一的名稱。

trans-unit.source: To request that an available port be dynamically assigned, set the `port` parameter to 0 (zero).
trans-unit.target: 若要要求可用的通訊埠動態指派，請設定`port`參數為 0 （零）。

trans-unit.source: The name of the channel.
trans-unit.target: 通道的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The port on which the channel listens.
trans-unit.target: 通道所接聽的通訊埠。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel"></xref> class with the specified channel properties, sink, and authorization provider.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel"></xref>與指定的通道內容、 接收器和授權提供者的類別。

trans-unit.source: For more information about channel configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe).
trans-unit.target: 如需通道組態屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[通道和格式器組態屬性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the server computer is running Windows 95/98/Me, the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel> cannot be specified as secure.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果伺服器電腦正在執行 Windows 95/98/Me，<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel>不能指定為安全。</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> collection that specifies values for configuration properties to be used by the channel.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>指定之通道所使用的組態屬性值的集合。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkProvider"></xref> implementation to be used by the channel.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkProvider"> </xref>通道所使用的實作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection"></xref> implementation to be used by the channel.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection"> </xref>通道所使用的實作。

trans-unit.source: A provided channel property was badly formatted.
trans-unit.target: 提供的通道屬性格式不正確。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel"></xref> class with the given name, which listens on the specified port, and uses the specified sink.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel"></xref>類別具有指定名稱，在指定的連接埠上接聽，並且使用指定的接收。

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel.ChannelName%2A> property by using the `name` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式設定<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel.ChannelName%2A>屬性使用`name`參數。</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel.ChannelName%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want to register more than one channel, each channel must have a unique name.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要註冊一個以上的通道，每個通道都必須具有唯一的名稱。

trans-unit.source: To request that an available port be dynamically assigned, set the `port` parameter to 0 (zero).
trans-unit.target: 若要要求可用的通訊埠動態指派，請設定`port`參數為 0 （零）。

trans-unit.source: If you do not require sink functionality, set the `sinkProvider` parameter to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不需要接收功能，設定`sinkProvider`參數`null`。

trans-unit.source: The name of the channel.
trans-unit.target: 通道的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The port on which the channel listens.
trans-unit.target: 通道所接聽的通訊埠。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkProvider"></xref> implementation to be used by the channel.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkProvider"> </xref>通道所使用的實作。

trans-unit.source: Gets channel-specific data.
trans-unit.target: 取得通道特定資料。

trans-unit.source: Although returned as an instance of <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName>, the value of this property can be cast to an instance of <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ChannelDataStore> describing the channel to which the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel> object listens.
trans-unit.target: 雖然執行個體的形式傳回<xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName>，這個屬性的值可以轉換成的執行個體<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ChannelDataStore>描述的通道<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel>物件接聽。</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ChannelDataStore> </xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ChannelDataStore"></xref> instance containing channel-specific data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ChannelDataStore"> </xref>包含通道特定資料執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the current channel.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前通道的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Every registered channel has a unique name.
trans-unit.target: 每個已註冊的通道都有唯一的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name is used to retrieve a specific channel when calling <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ChannelServices.GetChannel%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 名稱用來擷取特定的通道呼叫<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ChannelServices.GetChannel%2A>.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ChannelServices.GetChannel%2A>時

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> instance that contains the name of the channel.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>執行個體，其中包含通道的名稱。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the priority of the current channel.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前通道的優先權。

trans-unit.source: The priority controls the order in which channel data appears in a <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef> instance; higher priority channels appear before lower priority channels.
trans-unit.target: 優先權會控制哪些通道資料會出現在次序<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef>執行個體，則會出現較低優先順序通道之前的較高優先順序通道。</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef>

trans-unit.source: Clients try to connect to the server channels in the order that they are listed in the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef> instance.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端嘗試連接到伺服器中的通道中列出的順序<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef>執行個體。</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef>

trans-unit.source: The default priority is 1; negative priorities are allowed.
trans-unit.target: 預設優先權為 1。允許使用負值的優先順序。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the priority assigned to the channel.
trans-unit.target: 整數，代表指派給通道的優先權。

trans-unit.source: Returns the URI of the current channel.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前通道的 URI。

trans-unit.source: The URI of the current channel.
trans-unit.target: 目前通道的 URI。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of all the URLs for an object with the specified URI, hosted on the current <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回陣列中所有 Url 的物件使用指定的 URI，在目前裝載<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel"></xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This method is used by <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ChannelServices.GetUrlsForObject%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是由<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ChannelServices.GetUrlsForObject%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ChannelServices.GetUrlsForObject%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The URI of the object for which URLs are required.
trans-unit.target: 物件的 Url 所需的 URI。

trans-unit.source: An array of the URLs for an object with the specified URI, hosted on the current <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 URI，在目前裝載物件的 Url 陣列<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel"></xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the current channel is secure.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定布林值，指出目前的通道是否安全。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether the current instance is secure.
trans-unit.target: 布林值，指出目前的執行個體是否為安全。

trans-unit.source: Extracts the channel URI and the remote well-known object URI from the specified URL.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的 URL 擷取通道的 URI 以及遠端的已知物件的 URI。

trans-unit.source: The URI of an object is a value that uniquely identifies a specific object instance.
trans-unit.target: 物件的 URI 是唯一識別特定物件執行個體的值。

trans-unit.source: The URL from which to extract the URI of the remote well-known object.
trans-unit.target: 要從中擷取遠端的已知物件的 URI URL。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a <xref:System.String> instance that holds the URI of the remote well-known object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法傳回時，包含<xref:System.String>遠端的已知物件的 URI 會保存的執行個體。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數未初始化便傳遞。

trans-unit.source: The URI of the current channel.
trans-unit.target: 目前通道的 URI。

trans-unit.source: Instructs the current channel to start listening for requests.
trans-unit.target: 指示目前的通道開始接聽要求。

trans-unit.source: It is not necessary to call this method to begin listening on a newly initialized channel.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要呼叫這個方法，以開始接聽新初始化通道。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to restart listening on a channel after the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel.StopListening%2A> method has been called to stop listening on the channel.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來重新啟動之後通道上的接聽<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel.StopListening%2A>已停止接聽通道上呼叫方法。</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel.StopListening%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your channel uses a dynamically assigned port number, your port number might change when you restart listening.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的通道會使用動態指派的通訊埠編號，當您重新啟動接聽時，可能會變更連接埠號碼。

trans-unit.source: The data object can be used to pass a specific initialization state to the channel.
trans-unit.target: 資料物件可以用來傳遞至通道的特定初始狀態。

trans-unit.source: If you do not want to pass a specific state to the channel, set `data` to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想將特定的狀態傳遞至通道，設定`data`至`null`。

trans-unit.source: Optional initialization information.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性的初始化資訊。

trans-unit.source: Instructs the current channel to stop listening for requests.
trans-unit.target: 指示要停止接聽要求的目前通道。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to stop listening on a channel.
trans-unit.target: 若要停止接聽通道上使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: To restart listening, use the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel.StartListening%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要重新啟動接聽，請使用<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel.StartListening%2A>方法。</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel.StartListening%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your channel uses a dynamically assigned port number, your port number might change when you restart listening.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的通道會使用動態指派的通訊埠編號，當您重新啟動接聽時，可能會變更連接埠號碼。

trans-unit.source: The data object can be used to pass a specific initialization state to the channel.
trans-unit.target: 資料物件可以用來傳遞至通道的特定初始狀態。

trans-unit.source: If you do not want to pass a specific state to the channel, set `data` to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想將特定的狀態傳遞至通道，設定`data`至`null`。

trans-unit.source: Optional state information for the channel.
trans-unit.target: 通道的選擇性狀態資訊。
